member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:FluentAssertions.Mvc.FailureMessages.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:FluentAssertions.Mvc.FailureMessages.CommonFailMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected {0} to be '{1}' but found '{2}'.

member.name: P:FluentAssertions.Mvc.FailureMessages.RouteData_DataTokens_ContainsKey
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to RouteData.DataTokens does not contain key {0}..

member.name: P:FluentAssertions.Mvc.FailureMessages.RouteData_DataTokens_HaveValue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected RouteData.DataTokens[{0}] to have value {1}, but found {2}..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to RouteData.Values does not contain key {0}..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected RouteData.Values[{0}] to have value {1}, but found {2}..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected MasterName to be {0} but found {1}..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected Model to be of type {0}, but no Model was supplied..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ViewData does not contain key of {0}..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected ViewData[{0}] to have value {1}, but found {2}..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected ViewName to be {0} but found {1}..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected default view, but view {0} was rendered..
